org.jugsaxony.treed.api

Class Bulb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jugsaxony.treed.api.Bulb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public class Bulb
extends Object
implements Constants
    Representing a single LED on the tree. It has a position (x,y,z), a position in the sequence of bulbs and a color.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.jugsaxony.treed.api.Constants

        NUM_BULBS, RGB_BLACK, RGB_BLUE, RGB_CYAN, RGB_GREEN, RGB_PURPLE, RGB_RED, RGB_WHITE, RGB_YELLOW, TREE_HEIGHT, TREE_RADIUS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bulb(int index, double x, double y, double z)
      Constructor used by the framework.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fade(int amount)
      Reduces the brightness of each color component by amount, making it darker.

      All Bulbs are in a fixed sequence and the index describes the position in that sequence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bulb

        public Bulb(int index,
            double x,
            double y,
            double z)
        Constructor used by the framework. There is no particular need for you (the participant) to create a bulb. At least, none that we can think of. But what do we know... so we didn't hide the constructor.
        Parameters:
        index - position in the sequence of bulbs
        x - position left-right ascending in 3D space
        y - position front-rear ascending in 3D space
        z - position bottom-top ascending in 3D space

    • Method Detail

      • getRgb

        public int getRgb()
        Returns the RGB color as one value.
        Returns:
        the color as one value (0x00RRGGBB)

      • setRgb

        public void setRgb(int rgb)
        Set the RGB color as one value.
        Parameters:
        rgb - the new color as one value (0x00RRGGBB)

      • setR

        public void setR(int value)
        Set only the red component of the RGB color.
        Parameters:
        value - value of red color component (ranging from 0x00 to 0xff)

      • setG

        public void setG(int value)
        Set only the green component of the RGB color.
        Parameters:
        value - value of green color component (ranging from 0x00 to 0xff)

      • setB

        public void setB(int value)
        Set only the blue component of the RGB color.
        Parameters:
        value - value of blue color component (ranging from 0x00 to 0xff)

      • getX

        public double getX()
        The position of the bulb is defined by x,y, and z. This method returns x.
        Returns:
        the x coordinate of this bulbs position

      • getY

        public double getY()
        The position of the bulb is defined by x,y, and z. This method returns y.
        Returns:
        the y coordinate of this bulbs position

      • getZ

        public double getZ()
        The position of the bulb is defined by x,y, and z. This method returns z.
        Returns:
        the z coordinate of this bulbs position

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        All Bulbs are in a fixed sequence and the index describes the position in that sequence.
        Returns:
        Where in the sequence of Bulbs is this one?

      • fade

        public void fade(int amount)
        Reduces the brightness of each color component by amount, making it darker.
        Parameters:
        amount - How much darker should each color component be?
